statements: SELECT id, name, address, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT name, address, phone_number, id FROM customers;
SELECT address, id, phone_number, name FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name FROM customers WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customers;
SELECT name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM billing_info WHERE billing_date >= '2022-01-01' AND billing_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN billing_info ON customers.customer_id = billing_info.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address, total_amount FROM customers JOIN billing_info ON customers.customer_id = billing_info.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, contact_number FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, billing_date, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN billing_info ON customers.customer_id = billing_info.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, billing_date FROM billing_info WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY billing_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_info WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, count(order_id) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING order_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, billing_address, payment_method FROM billing_info WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount_paid FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT full_name, address, contact_number FROM customers
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount_paid < 100 ORDER BY payment_date ASC

SELECT c.full_name, o.order_date, p.product_name, py.amount_paid FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.order_id = p.product_id JOIN payments py ON o.order_id = py.order_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_contact FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, city, state FROM customers JOIN addresses ON customers.customer_id = addresses.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.order_date, orders.order_total, customers.customer_name FROM orders INNER JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT payments.payment_id, payments.payment_date, payments.payment_amount, orders.order_total FROM payments INNER JOIN orders ON payments.order_id = orders.order_id;
SELECT products.product_name, products.product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
